text: Teruel () is a city in Aragon, located in eastern Spain, and is also the capital of Teruel Province. It has a population of 35,675 in 2014Instituto Nacional de Estadística, Cifras oficiales de población resultantes de la revisión del Padrón municipal a 1 de enero de 2014, Resumen por Capitales de provincias making it the least populated provincial capital in the country. ==References== Category:Capital cities in Spain Category:Province of Teruel Category:Municipalities in Aragon
title: Teruel
